text: avane (svālihine) yuṁ avanṟe āḷukaḷeyuṁ namukk rātriyil keānnukaḷayaṇamennuṁ pinnīṭ avanṟe avakāśiyēāṭ‌, tanṟe āḷukaḷuṭe nāśattin ñaṅṅaḷ sākṣyaṁ vahicciṭṭilla, tīrccayāyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷ satyaṁ paṟayunnavarākunnu enn nāṁ paṟayaṇamennuṁ niṅṅaḷ allāhuvinṟe pēril satyaṁ ceyyaṇaṁ enn avar tam'mil paṟaññuṟaccu
